comments: Regular continued fraction of (5+sqrt 35)/10. - R. J. Mathar, Nov 21 2011
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n)=-9/2*(-1)^n+11/2 a(n)=10*(n mod 2)+(n+1) mod 2 - Paolo P. Lava, Oct 20 2006G.f.: (1+10*z)/(1-z^2). [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Feb 25 2009]a(n) = 10^n mod 11.  - M. F. Hasler, Mar 10, 2011
maple: g:=(1+10*z)/((1-z^2)): gser:=series(g, z=0, 66): seq((coeff(gser, z, n)), n=0..65);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Feb 25 2009]
prog: (MAGMA) [10^n mod 11: n in [0..80]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Aug 24 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
